posts.description:
#3OccupySF, Ustream.TV: @punkboyinsf here, broadcasting live and direct from #occupysf #occupyoakland or possibly another #occupy :)
San Francisco or Oakla...
posts.extended: We're holding down the bay, take care of #888Turk for us. Stay safe. Love from #oo / #ogp  ( #OCCUPYSF live at )

posts.description: Twitter / susie_c: Sheriff confirms he's hold
posts.extended: RT @susie_c: Sheriff confirms he's holding an M-4 assault rifle. Asks old woman to back away from him. #OO #baym1gs

posts.description:
pixplz on USTREAM: I'm an independent advocacy journalist and teacher living in San Francisco. I mostly stream Occupy events in the Bay Area.

You can supp...
posts.extended: Can you ask OPD to confirm mutual aid / Alameda cty carrying live ammo / M4s / AR-15 ? Many photos ( @pixplz live at )
I'm broadcasting #occupyoakland live on #Ustream. Come watch and chat! 10:30 PM

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: This is the gang of pigs (
posts.extended: This is the gang of pigs (gang of motorcycle cops off picture right) that chased every1 north on broadway ~11 last nite

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: In this episode of #OPDCov
posts.extended: In this episode of #OPDCoveringBadges (I hope this hashtag catches) we have this same cop covering name with shotgun.

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: This is another #opd offic
posts.extended: This is another #opd officer using his weapon to obscure his name- if you know it / have pics lemme know #occupyoakland

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: These cop portraits are so
posts.extended: These cop portraits are so weird. Why do I do this?

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: I was all "You're those am
posts.extended: I was all "You're those amtrak pigs who ran over that bike this morning, huh?" maybe not best "cheese" replacement #oo
Here's more of #OPDCoveringBadges - similar situation, wearing a vest that carries munitions + stops accountability:
#OPDCoveringBadges For contrast, Alameda Cty. writes badge # on vest 4 accountability. Still covered w/ weapon though.

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: Seriously people, does thi
posts.extended: Seriously people, does this look like a democratic America to you? Or something/somewhere else? #occupyoakland #oo

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: 3 Alameda Cty. cops laugh
posts.extended: 3 Alameda Cty. cops laugh near their $300K+ tank while a woman goes through trash for food / recyclables #occupyoakland
